description: Provides information about the queues for the specified Amazon Connect instance. If you do not specify a QueueTypes parameter, both standard and agent queues are returned. This might cause an unexpected truncation of results if you have more than 1000 agents and you limit the number of results of the API call in code. For more information about queues, see Queues: Standard and Agent in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the queue.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
